<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script creates records in the new m2ms created to store information about issue to object(Entity,Control/Risk, Control objective/Risk statement). </description> <name>Migrate issues to m2m tables</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var script = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); script.get('name', 'handle_issue_m2m_data_migration');
gs.executeNow(script); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-05 17:22:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>53c2922e539211109b88ddeeff7b12e5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Migrate issues to m2m tables</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_53c2922e539211109b88ddeeff7b12e5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-25 12:38:48</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
